Hello, 
My product iPhone 13 has the above problem: 
Hello, I am eagerly waiting for my package and it hasn't given any updates for over 48 hours. It's supposed to arrive today but is still in transit again. What's going on? 

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

The customer has not yet received the delivery. The status has changed since 05/14/24. not changed.

Could you please contact the supplier and ask where the package went.

Sofie Rahn
Gröperstraße 29
16909 Wittstock/Dosse

+4915225323858
sofierahn04@icloud.com

Dear ecomobile

Can you please give me a reply to my previous message.

Regards,
Ercan from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

i have informed our logistics partner of this issue and await updates.

Regards,
RK

Hello,

My iPhone 13 has the above problem:

Package apparently lost, waiting since 1.5 weeks although it should have arrived last Tuesday.

Thank you very much for your help,

Hello!

The tracking status of this order has not changed in 4 business days and is now considered lost as per Back Market delivery policy. We have requested the Back Market certificate of non-receipt and picture of the customers ID to arrange a refund or a replacement.
 
Once all the paperwork has been gathered we’ll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment. The deadline is 24 hours from reception of the documents

If at any point the delivery begins to move again a refund will not be issued and the order is considered to be late.

Best regards,
Ercan - Back Market

Hello!

The parcel has not been successfully delivered yet and all the requirements for a refund as described by our lost parcel policy have been fulfilled. Any and all relevant paperwork has been attached to this message.

You can use the attached documents to investigate the matter with your delivery company

This order will be refunded in 24 hours 

You can now blacklist the device.

Best regards,
Ercan - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We have shared the necessary documents with our logistics partner. We would get back to you when we receive a reply from them. Please do NOT refund the customer in the mean time.

Thank you.
Regards,
SY
